title: 100% reproduction, no controls register input
body: The video explains it pretty well, but I currently can't input any controls into LoL. I've never seen anything like it, and it happens every time. Gamebreaking.

replies.body:
Most of the time when this happens, it ends up being a mismatch between your config settings. If your client doesn't correctly download them when starting a game, then sometimes none of your keys work at all. Try doing a quick config reset and test it out in a custom for me.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Someone actually figured it out. For anyone else looking for a solution, it's interference from Discord. If you turn off Discord's overlay, the problem vanishes.

Still really weird though.
